meta.title: Ethan Yu | Frontend Developer | Portfolio
meta.description: Frontend Developer. Patent-pending digital therapeutic developer and accessibility library maintainer. Operating 800K+ member app

introduction.paragraph1: I started my journey into software development after discovering my passion for JavaScript while studying linguistics.
introduction.paragraph2: I am passionate about leveraging technology for social impact, advancing web accessibility, and promoting inclusive design. I usually focus on enhancing both visible and invisible aspects of user experience, primarily through working on design systems and accessibility solutions. I am the developer of the patent-pending digital therapeutic(Perfect Care) and the maintainer of the accessibility library(@uturi/sonification).
introduction.paragraph3: I launched an AI-based ESL web service and currently lead the frontend team at Tictoccroc, overseeing a hybrid app with over 800K cumulative members.

current.description: I developed a hybrid app for childcare matching services called [Tictoccroc].
achievements: Selected as Employee of the Year 2024
Built accessibility-enhanced design system, improved accessibility of 36+ components including DatePicker, Autocomplete, contributing to a11y certification
Developed Stackflow-based screen transition plugin to provide enhanced user experience like native apps even in webview environment Try it yourself
Built 8 frontend library monorepos to improve development productivity and reusability
Migrated 3 legacy apps (React, PHP, Flutter) to ensure service stability and development efficiency
Built team API server environment and released 2 MVPs, driving 20% increase in visitors/members
Independently developed offline store operation system, saving over 10 million won in annual fixed costs

previous.description: Worked on the early development of AI-based services leveraging the research institute's voice data collection and analysis platform and in-house STT/TTS models. Later joined the team to develop the AI children's English learning service [RockieTalkie].
achievements: Led initial team building, development to release of RockieTalkie based on STT and pronunciation evaluation AI models
Developed voice recognition-based barrier-free kiosk service, successfully introduced to 3 institutions, creating social value
Developed and operated voice collection/analysis platform with approximately 6,000 DAU, stably collecting and processing over 1,000 hours of large-scale data per quarter
Developed JS voice processing library to implement voice file editing and tagging functions

uturi.title: @uturi Accessibility Library
uturi.description: The @uturi accessibility tool project was inspired by the Korean folktale 'Baby Hero Uturi,' who overcame disabilities to become a hero. I have currently pre-released one library (alpha).

sonification.title: @uturi/sonification (v0.0.6)
sonification.description: A library that converts numerical data into sound for screen reader users who have difficulty understanding tables or time-series charts.
sonification.description2: It helps users understand changes in data as quickly as visual users by converting numerical changes into melody, rhythm, and volume (with detailed customization options).

ui.title: @uturi/ui (In Development)
ui.description: Provides complex components such as ChainPicker and BottomSheet.
ui.description2: These components consider all accessibility aspects including keyboard interaction and screen reading.

perfectCare.title: Online Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder Treatment [Perfect Care]
perfectCare.description: A web service created to help improve obsessive-compulsive disorder. Planned and developed in collaboration with YD Psychiatry, receiving data from them. After effectiveness verification testing, filed for patent in June 2024.

icbt.title: Internet-based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (iCBT) Related Web Services
icbt.description:
I attempted to address the blind spots in psychological treatment and research through technology.
I planned and developed various services to incorporate technology into the iCBT field I was passionate about.
Some online tests were actually used in research.
services: Web-based chatbot for anxiety disorder pre-counseling
Online web game based on Dot-probe task for clients with social anxiety disorder

csat.title: NLP-based College Scholastic Ability Test Question Generation Service
csat.description:
Developed a CSAT English question generation model based on RNN and LSTM models.
Responsible for overall web development and built a Django API server to communicate with the model.

university.name: Korea University
university.description: Studied natural language processing (voice) in English Literature and user behavior analysis (UX), cognitive psychology, and neuroscience in Psychology. Started development while working as a research student at the voice research institute.

awards.title: Awards and Activities
awards.deepmunhakdo.description: NLP-based CSAT English passage and question generation service

contact.title: Contact
contact.message: If you're interested in new projects or collaboration, feel free to contact me anytime. Let's create amazing things together! 🌈
